title: Obtain the Sinner
text: I never hesitate to step towards a companion... Take me with you, my little monster.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: How I wish to see what has become of my soul now.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: Seeing me like this, what do you have on your mind now? I wish to hear it from you...

title: Level Start
text: I've already seen through you. Save your futile struggle and surrender...

title: Win Battles
text: Upright Chariot. I knew the victory would be ours.

title: Lose Battles
text: Well, accidents happen in battles... It can't be helped...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: I will read your mind and everything else... I will see through your soul!

title: Die in Battles
text: At long last... my soul is freed...

title: Greeting
text: According to the crystal, I'll be the first person you'll see today...

title: Conversation 1
text: The white desert is like a pure dreamland where immaculate flowers bloom...

title: Conversation 2
text: You seem to be really fond of my ability... Do you want to have your fortune read? Relax, whatever you want to know... I have an answer for you...

title: Conversation 3
text: Never ask where they're from. Never ask where they'll go. Those are my rules of fortune-telling... Well, unless I answer those questions first...

title: Special Conversation 1
text: The souls from the Black Ring possess true and pure beauty. They are not ugly at all. On the contrary, those humans who confine themselves... don't you think they look more ridiculous?

title: Special Conversation 2
text: I hear that you're looking into my past? Why don't you just ask me? Hmm... Which version do you want to hear?

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I have visited the realm of truth in my dreams. I hope that... one day, you will appear there as well.

title: Full Compliance
text: Now, I can take off all my disguises and show you my truest self... Hmm, what is it? All I did was lose a few pieces of clothing, are you shy?

title: Idle
text: Shh... I'm communicating with the souls.

title: Annoyed
text: Are you satisfied with physical touch alone? Why don't you let me teach you... how to embrace each other's soul?

title: Special Attention
text: You give me so much attention... Wanna run away with me, my dear little monster?

title: Dispatch
text: Hmm, is it the land of truth and purity before us?

title: Dispatch Complete
text: I feel most at ease around you.

title: Level Up
text: The true form of the soul is so elusive, yet so fascinating...

title: Join Team
text: Oh, those who are lost... Get in line if you want to have your fortune read...

title: Head Pat
text: Ha, that's exactly how those novice fortune-tellers touch the crystal ball.

title: Attire Obtained
text: Finder of the legendary magic lamp of WhiteSands, you've summoned me. As a reward, I can grant you a wish.

title: Greeting
text: Poor lamb, have you lost your way in the desert? Fret not... Just follow me.

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Those who share the water of life under WhiteSands' moon will meet again on the other side. Emm... You gaze... Do you want to raise a glass with me?

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: Charming her prey with her tame and lovely appearance. Luring them with their desires into her trap. Taking a fatal bite into the veins... Hmm? I'm only talking about... this adorable sand cat.

title: Idle
text: How many nights have passed already?

title: Annoyed
text: A heedless stroke at the cat's tail may come with consequences...

title: Level Up
text: These kitties quite enjoy your petting.

title: Special Attention
text: As long as you stay by my side forever, I can grant you... any wish.
